General.Name: Nusantara Infrastructure Tbk
General.Description: PT Nusantara Infrastructure Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates and manages toll roads in Indonesia. The company operates through six segments: Toll Road Management Services, Investment, Ports, Water, Energy, and Telecommunications Towers. It also engages in the clean water treatment, management, and distribution activities; provision of port services; construction and operation of dry and liquid cargo terminals; and telecommunication and trading business. The company was formerly known as PT Metamedia Technologies Tbk and changed its name to PT Nusantara Infrastructure Tbk in June 2006. PT Nusantara Infrastructure Tbk was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Nusantara Infrastructure Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Metro Pacific Tollways Indonesia.
